mchorse.mappet.api.scripts.user

Interface IScriptServer


  • public interface IScriptServer
    This interface represent the server passed in the event. 
    
    function main(c)
    {
        var server = c.getServer();

        // Do something with server...
    }

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean entityExists(java.lang.String uuid)
      Check if an entity with given UUID exists.
      void executeScript(java.lang.String scriptName)
      Execute a script with a given script name and the default function "main".
      void executeScript(java.lang.String scriptName, java.lang.String function)
      Execute a script with a given script name and a specified function.
      void executeScript(java.lang.String scriptName, java.lang.String function, java.lang.Object... args)
      Execute a script with a given script name, a specified function and arguments.
      java.util.List<IScriptPlayer> getAllPlayers()
      Get all players on the server.
      java.util.List<IScriptEntity> getEntities(java.lang.String targetSelector)
      Get all entities matching giving target selector.
      IScriptEntity getEntity(java.lang.String uuid)
      Get an entity by its UUID.
      MinecraftServer getMinecraftServer()
      Get Minecraft server instance.
      IScriptPlayer getPlayer(java.lang.String username)
      Get a player by their username.
      IMappetStates getStates()
      Get global (server) states.
      IScriptWorld getWorld(int dimension)
      Get world at dimension ID.
      default boolean isOnline(java.lang.String username)
      Check if a player is online.

    • Method Detail

      • getMinecraftServer

        MinecraftServer getMinecraftServer()
        Get Minecraft server instance. BEWARE: you need to know the MCP mappings in order to directly call methods on this instance!

      • getWorld

        IScriptWorld getWorld(int dimension)
        Get world at dimension ID. 
        
    var overworld = c.getServer().getWorld(0);

    // Do something with the world...

      • getEntities

        java.util.List<IScriptEntity> getEntities(java.lang.String targetSelector)
        Get all entities matching giving target selector. 
        
    var cows = c.getServer().getEntities("@e[type=minecraft:cow]");

    // Despawn all cows
    for (var i in cows)
    {
        cows[i].remove();
    }

      • getEntity

        IScriptEntity getEntity(java.lang.String uuid)
        Get an entity by its UUID. 
        
    var uuid = "29a91933-86f2-4683-8a87-218084d8c927";
    var entity = c.getServer().getEntity(uuid);

    print(entity.getUniqueId() === uuid); // true

      • getAllPlayers

        java.util.List<IScriptPlayer> getAllPlayers()
        Get all players on the server. 
        
    var players = c.getServer().getAllPlayers();

    for (var i in players)
    {
        // Surprise :)
        players[i].setMotion(0, 0.5, 0);
    }

      • getPlayer

        IScriptPlayer getPlayer(java.lang.String username)
        Get a player by their username. 
        
    var player = c.getServer().getPlayer("Notch");

    if (player)
    {
        // I'm about to pull a prank on Notch... >:)
        //
        // Or give a nice present... :)
    }

      • isOnline

        default boolean isOnline(java.lang.String username)
        Check if a player is online. 
        
    if (!c.getServer().isOnline("McHorse"))
    {
        c.send("McHorse is not online. :(")
    }

      • getStates

        IMappetStates getStates()
        Get global (server) states. 
        
    var states = c.getServer().getStates();

    if (states.getNumber("total_money_earned") > 1000000000)
    {
        // Give all players an achievement or something...
    }

      • entityExists

        boolean entityExists(java.lang.String uuid)
        Check if an entity with given UUID exists. 
        
    if (c.getServer().entityExists("29a91933-86f2-4683-8a87-218084d8c927"))
    {
        // Do something...
    }
        Parameters:
        uuid - The UUID of the entity to check for existence.
        Returns:
        true if an entity with the specified UUID exists, false otherwise.

      • executeScript

        void executeScript(java.lang.String scriptName)
        Execute a script with a given script name and the default function "main". 
        
    c.getServer().executeScript("example_script.js");
        Parameters:
        scriptName - The name of the script to execute.

      • executeScript

        void executeScript(java.lang.String scriptName,
                   java.lang.String function)
        Execute a script with a given script name and a specified function. 
        
    c.getServer().executeScript("example_script.js", "custom_function");
        Parameters:
        scriptName - The name of the script to execute.
        function - The name of the function within the script to execute.

      • executeScript

        void executeScript(java.lang.String scriptName,
                   java.lang.String function,
                   java.lang.Object... args)
        Execute a script with a given script name, a specified function and arguments. 
        
 c.getServer().executeScript("example_script.js", "func_with_context", c, 1, 2, 3);
 c.getServer().executeScript("example_script.js", "func_without_context", 1, 2, 3);

 // example_script.js
 function func_with_context(c, arg1, arg2, arg3)
 {
     c.send("arg1: " + arg1 + ", arg2: " + arg2 + ", arg3: " + arg3);
 }

 function func_without_context(arg1, arg2, arg3)
 {
     print("arg1: " + arg1 + ", arg2: " + arg2 + ", arg3: " + arg3);
 }
        Parameters:
        scriptName - The name of the script to execute.
        function - The name of the function within the script to execute.
        args - The arguments to pass to the function.
